sentences.english: The design celebrates the built-up , engineered landscape of the Garden site and the City of Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 设计颂扬了花园基址和芝加哥城市已建成的工程景观。

sentences.english: The base address or the file offset specified does not have the proper alignment.
sentences.chinese: 指定的基址或文件偏移量没有适当对齐。

sentences.english: When overridden in a derived class, retrieves the base address of the host.
sentences.chinese: 当在派生类中被重写时，检索主机的基址。

sentences.english: Initially, this pointer is set to the managed heap's base address.
sentences.chinese: 最初，该指针设置为指向托管堆的基址。

sentences.english: If the preferred base address is unavailable, the operating system will not load the file.
sentences.chinese: 如果首选基址不可用，则操作系统将不加载该文件。

sentences.english: And therefore, having a base in Singapore will help you to enter into China.
sentences.chinese: 因此，将新加坡作为基址将有助于你们进入中国市场。

sentences.english: A pointer to the entry point function, relative to the image base address.
sentences.chinese: 一个指针的入口点函数，相对的基址。

definition: old site/site of sth (palace, ancient state etc) that no longer exists
variant of 周長|周长[zhou1 chang2]
path leading to a grave/tomb passage/aisle leading to the coffin chamber of an ancient tomb
